title: Cutouts Were All Over the iHeartRadio Red Carpet - Shop The Look
description: The cutout dress is getting a 2025 makeover, and we're here for it. Though cutouts have been everywhere these past few seasons, they're getting more inventive and unique by the day. Stars like Lady Gaga, Ashanti, and Kelsea Ballerini donned alluring ensembles with cutouts at this year's iHeartRadio Music Awards, further cementing the trend (wearing Stella McCartney, Balmain, and Alexandre Vauthier, respectively). Cutout dresses now come with accents across the stomach, collarbone, chest, shoulders - you name it. If you've been seeing the viral fashion trend all over TikTok and in red-carpet photos and want to try it on for size, here are 15 sexy styles that are worth scooping up. From statement minidresses and comfortable maxis to body-hugging cutout dresses and everything in between, we've got standout pieces for a variety of styles and outings. Whether you're heading out to your favorite neighborhood bar or glamming up for a black-tie event, there's multiple options for you. A few standouts include a side cutout dress that's polished yet reveals just enough to turn heads, an edgy leather dress with unexpected cutouts, a comfortable sweater dress that's wearable throughout the season, and a playful back cutout dress that's demure from the front but super-sexy from the back. Keep on reading to shop our top picks.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Cutout dresses are having a moment. From a sophisticated side cutout dress to a playful and printed front cutout dress, shop our favorite styles!
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.The cutout dress is getting a 2025 makeover, and we're here for it. Though cutouts have been everywhere these past few seasons, they're getting more inventive and unique by the day. Stars like Lady Gaga, Ashanti, and Kelsea Ballerini donned alluring ensembles with cutouts at this year's iHeartRadio Music Awards, further cementing the trend (wearing Stella McCartney, Balmain, and Alexandre Vauthier, respectively). Cutout dresses now come with accents across the stomach, collarbone, chest, shoulders — you name it. If you've been seeing the viral fashion trend all over TikTok and in red-carpet photos and want to try it on for size, here are 15 sexy styles that are worth scooping up. GettyFrom statement minidresses and comfortable maxis to body-hugging cutout dresses and everything in between, we've got standout pieces for a variety of styles and outings. Whether you're heading out to your favorite neighborhood bar or glamming up for a black-tie event, there's multiple options for you. A few standouts include a side cutout dress that's polished yet reveals just enough to turn heads, an edgy leather dress with unexpected cutouts, a comfortable sweater dress that's wearable throughout the season, and a playful back cutout dress that's demure from the front but super-sexy from the back. Keep on reading to shop our top picks.amazon.comBest Affordable Cutout DressAcelitt Twist Bodycon Dress ($28) In the market for a cool, front cutout dress for spring? Us too. That's why we're crushing hard on this body-hugging number. The midriff opening is such a fun detail, and the fact that it's under $50 makes us want it all the more.zara.comBest Front Cutout DressZara Asymmetric Contouring Stretch Dress ($50) Who wouldn't love this super sleek number from Zara? Not only does it have a subtle neck cutout, but it also comes with a bodycon design that makes it the perfect cutout dress for evening wear. We're also obsessed with the midi length which completes the look with a polished flair.eloquii.comBest Sleeveless Cutout DressBridal by ELOQUII Cutout Maxi Dress ($55, originally $119) If you want to bring an ethereal energy to your next black-tie event, you can never go wrong with a long white dress, especially one with subtle slits like this one. Whether it's an evening party or an outdoor soirée, this is a cutout dress you can wear for it all.asos.comBest Long-Sleeve Cutout DressASOS DESIGN High Neck Knotted Detail Maxi Dress ($70) Cutout dresses might not seem like a go-to winter style, but this one from ASOS proves they totally could be. The body-hugging frock is wrapped in a smooth jersey material that's elevated by its twist detail and side buckle.revolve.comBest Leather Cutout DressSuperdown Amelia Sheer Dress ($78) Leather dresses are one of our favorite winter trends, and we've never seen a leather dress with cutouts like this sheer number. The mesh covering over the stomach and legs are both flattering and unexpected, especially if you don't want to show too much skin.meshki.usBest Back Cutout DressMeshki Katerina Scuba Jersey Cut Out Maxi Dress ($99) If you're looking for a classic, sophisticated dress that's still comfortable, this option from Meshki is the one for you. We love how the cutout doesn't run across the whole back, making it into a subtle, head-turning moment.revolve.comBest Midi Cutout DressBaobab Concha Dress ($137, originally $285) This lime green dress will absolutely stun everyone at your next evening party. We were sold on the color alone, but the design of the side cutout dress helps to elevate the look with the most subtle and sexy touch — making it super-breathable and promising for transitional wear too.revolve.comBest Sexy Cutout DressJaded London Vixen Maxi Dress ($165) Doesn't the print on this maxi dress just scream vacation? We love how it features only one cutout at the waist, which is super-flattering yet timeless. This is perfect for a fun party or dinner on a warm summer's night.revolve.comBest Sweater Cutout DressCamila Coelho Nahla Knit Dress ($180) Cutouts are getting more and more creative lately. Such is the case with this forest-green frock. We love the asymmetrical hip cutout that cascades the left side, along with the deep off-the-shoulder detail. Whether dressed up or down, this is a fun everyday option to have on hand.saksoff5th.comBest Side Cutout DressAmur Katy Cutout Dress ($224, originally $448) Whoever said florals are reserved strictly for the spring clearly hasn't seen this dress. The darker, moodier colors are exactly how you do winter florals, and we love the airy, waist detailing on this side cutout dress. This style is a darling piece to have on hand for all seasons. shopbop.comBest Maxi Cutout DressStaud Astro Dress ($375) The cutouts on this Staud dress are sexy yet still sophisticated. Since you can and should wear white after Labor Day, this dress would look stunning with a jacket and statement boots in the colder months.revolve.comBest Cutout Shirt DressSimkhai Alex Pleated Cut Out Dress ($395) The only thing better than a shirt dress? One with cutouts. We like this flirty take with sandals or flats, but if you'd rather wear the cutout dress during the winter months, you could also pair it with knee-high boots and an overcoat.shopbop.comBest Trendy Cutout DressMISHA Kristin Dress ($413) Consider this classy one-shoulder dress for an outdoor wedding or even a date night with your partner. The asymmetrical cutout of this body-hugging frock is so striking — especially when paired with simple stilettos and a classic evening clutch for a night out.revolve.comBest Wedding-Guest Cutout DressKNWLS Cu Dress ($550) Spring wedding season is just around the corner, and if you've yet to find a style to wear for your next ceremony, this is a gorgeous choice. From the hip cutouts to the breathable fabric and leg slit, this cutout dress truly has it all.-Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.India Yaffe was an associate editor on the Shopping team at PS for five years. She focused on curating the best fitness, fashion, beauty, and home products on the market for the PS audience.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

The cutout dress is getting a 2025 makeover, and we're here for it. Though cutouts have been everywhere these past few seasons, they're getting more inventive and unique by the day. Stars like Lady Gaga, Ashanti, and Kelsea Ballerini donned alluring ensembles with cutouts at this year's iHeartRadio Music Awards, further cementing the trend (wearing Stella McCartney, Balmain, and Alexandre Vauthier, respectively). Cutout dresses now come with accents across the stomach, collarbone, chest, shoulders — you name it. If you've been seeing the viral fashion trend all over TikTok and in red-carpet photos and want to try it on for size, here are 15 sexy styles that are worth scooping up.

From statement minidresses and comfortable maxis to body-hugging cutout dresses and everything in between, we've got standout pieces for a variety of styles and outings. Whether you're heading out to your favorite neighborhood bar or glamming up for a black-tie event, there's multiple options for you. A few standouts include a side cutout dress that's polished yet reveals just enough to turn heads, an edgy leather dress with unexpected cutouts, a comfortable sweater dress that's wearable throughout the season, and a playful back cutout dress that's demure from the front but super-sexy from the back. Keep on reading to shop our top picks.

Best Affordable Cutout Dress

Acelitt Twist Bodycon Dress ($28)

In the market for a cool, front cutout dress for spring? Us too. That's why we're crushing hard on this body-hugging number. The midriff opening is such a fun detail, and the fact that it's under $50 makes us want it all the more.

Best Front Cutout Dress

Zara Asymmetric Contouring Stretch Dress ($50)

Who wouldn't love this super sleek number from Zara? Not only does it have a subtle neck cutout, but it also comes with a bodycon design that makes it the perfect cutout dress for evening wear. We're also obsessed with the midi length which completes the look with a polished flair.

Best Sleeveless Cutout Dress

Bridal by ELOQUII Cutout Maxi Dress ($55, originally $119)

If you want to bring an ethereal energy to your next black-tie event, you can never go wrong with a long white dress, especially one with subtle slits like this one. Whether it's an evening party or an outdoor soirée, this is a cutout dress you can wear for it all.

Best Long-Sleeve Cutout Dress

ASOS DESIGN High Neck Knotted Detail Maxi Dress ($70)

Cutout dresses might not seem like a go-to winter style, but this one from ASOS proves they totally could be. The body-hugging frock is wrapped in a smooth jersey material that's elevated by its twist detail and side buckle.

Best Leather Cutout Dress

Superdown Amelia Sheer Dress ($78)

Leather dresses are one of our favorite winter trends, and we've never seen a leather dress with cutouts like this sheer number. The mesh covering over the stomach and legs are both flattering and unexpected, especially if you don't want to show too much skin.

Best Back Cutout Dress

Meshki Katerina Scuba Jersey Cut Out Maxi Dress ($99)

If you're looking for a classic, sophisticated dress that's still comfortable, this option from Meshki is the one for you. We love how the cutout doesn't run across the whole back, making it into a subtle, head-turning moment.

Best Midi Cutout Dress

Baobab Concha Dress ($137, originally $285)

This lime green dress will absolutely stun everyone at your next evening party. We were sold on the color alone, but the design of the side cutout dress helps to elevate the look with the most subtle and sexy touch — making it super-breathable and promising for transitional wear too.

Best Sexy Cutout Dress

Jaded London Vixen Maxi Dress ($165)

Doesn't the print on this maxi dress just scream vacation? We love how it features only one cutout at the waist, which is super-flattering yet timeless. This is perfect for a fun party or dinner on a warm summer's night.

Best Sweater Cutout Dress

Camila Coelho Nahla Knit Dress ($180)

Cutouts are getting more and more creative lately. Such is the case with this forest-green frock. We love the asymmetrical hip cutout that cascades the left side, along with the deep off-the-shoulder detail. Whether dressed up or down, this is a fun everyday option to have on hand.

Best Side Cutout Dress

Amur Katy Cutout Dress ($224, originally $448)

Whoever said florals are reserved strictly for the spring clearly hasn't seen this dress. The darker, moodier colors are exactly how you do winter florals, and we love the airy, waist detailing on this side cutout dress. This style is a darling piece to have on hand for all seasons.

Best Maxi Cutout Dress

Staud Astro Dress ($375)

The cutouts on this Staud dress are sexy yet still sophisticated. Since you can and should wear white after Labor Day, this dress would look stunning with a jacket and statement boots in the colder months.

Best Cutout Shirt Dress

Simkhai Alex Pleated Cut Out Dress ($395)

The only thing better than a shirt dress? One with cutouts. We like this flirty take with sandals or flats, but if you'd rather wear the cutout dress during the winter months, you could also pair it with knee-high boots and an overcoat.

Best Trendy Cutout Dress

MISHA Kristin Dress ($413)

Consider this classy one-shoulder dress for an outdoor wedding or even a date night with your partner. The asymmetrical cutout of this body-hugging frock is so striking — especially when paired with simple stilettos and a classic evening clutch for a night out.

Best Wedding-Guest Cutout Dress

KNWLS Cu Dress ($550)

Spring wedding season is just around the corner, and if you've yet to find a style to wear for your next ceremony, this is a gorgeous choice. From the hip cutouts to the breathable fabric and leg slit, this cutout dress truly has it all.

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

India Yaffe was an associate editor on the Shopping team at PS for five years. She focused on curating the best fitness, fashion, beauty, and home products on the market for the PS audience.
